resources.string: The following section will contain information about the state that is highlighted.
This is a body of water, not one of the fifty United States.
This land is not in one of the fifty United States.
Welcome! This app allows you to compare data about each of the fifty United States and the District of Columbia. (Territories are not supported.)
Just select the topic you wish to learn about from this screen, and you will be able to compare them on the map!
